parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns path to currently selected item. IDC means id of parent Tree View.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[tvCurSel]] idc

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [[Tree View Path]] of selected item

</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> [[tvCurSel]] control

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] - [[Tree View Path]] of selected item

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[tvCurSel]] 101;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[tvCurSel]] _ctrl;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvAdd]], [[tvClear]], [[tvCollapse]], [[tvCount]], [[tvData]], [[tvDelete]], [[tvExpand]], [[tvPicture]], [[tvSetCurSel]], [[tvSetData]], [[tvSetPicture]], [[tvSetValue]], [[tvSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[tvText]], [[tvValue]]
</value></part></template></root>
